message.body: Do you have tour dates yet? In Philly?
Why, do you miss me?
Plucky move, Skidmore. Yea, I do. It was a rough week.
Tell me about your work Martha.
Week
I broke up with Tim, couldnt focus on school so i feel like i wasnt learning or creating, and had to do a lot of job related bullshit that totally wore me out.
Seriously, I'm really sorry to hear that. The last we spoke, you sounded more creative than any person I've ever personally known. And I sure hope work gets better this week
You should listen to Jesus wash away my troubles by the Soul Stirrers.
And we're in Philly March 30th
I'll do my damndest. Hopefully you play late in case I'm working.
That song is the perfect anodyne. Tears.
Sam doesn't ever let me down
I know right? That very first "Jesus" he sings. Oof
Just "Jesus" from Sam over and over
Hey by the way, can I get the go ahead to cover "Bunsen burner..." for a cabaret/benefit?
Wonderful. The musicians im working with really dig it, and are twilight zoning me out by singing it every now and then
It's one of Neil and Adam's better ones. He just finished recording one that Dillion from the Protos wrote a string arrangement for that's probably the best thing that's ever come out of this house
Ive never really listened to protomen stuff, is there a band camp thing?
It's all over. YouTube, Spotify, Protomen.com
Is that song on there?
Ahhhhh, yea do it.
